item.title: 最新美国数据助推美联储降息预期，国债上涨
item.description: 在修正后的美国就业数据强化了美联储将在下月开始降息的赌注后，国债走高。【原文：Treasuries edged higher after revised US employment data reinforced wagers the Federal Reserve will start cutting interest rates next month.】

item.title: 阿波罗的斯洛克认为美国经济不会放缓
item.description:
零售业收入和其他数据表明消费者具有弹性

。【原文：

Retail earnings and other data point to a resilient consumer

】

item.title: 淡马锡酝酿退出施耐德电气印度合资企业
item.description: 知情人士透露，淡马锡控股私人有限公司（Temasek Holdings Pte）正在权衡退出与施耐德电气公司（Schneider Electric SE）在印度合资企业的可能性。【原文：Temasek Holdings Pte is weighing a potential exit from an Indian joint venture with Schneider Electric SE, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 尼日利亚丹格特炼油厂越来越不使用美国原油
item.description: 尼日利亚的丹格特大型炼油厂正在更多地将本国石油用于加工，而来自美国的石油流入似乎正在减少。【原文：Nigeria’s Dangote mega-refinery is taking more of the country’s own oil for processing, while inflows from the US appear to be waning.】

item.title: 法国电力需求将降至年内最低水平，因高温天气有所缓解
item.description: 由于气温下降抑制了价格，法国的电力需求预计将达到一年来的最低水平。【原文：French power demand is forecast to reach its lowest level in a year as falling temperatures keep prices in check.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦将于明年推出新设计的纸币
item.description: 巴基斯坦中央银行行长贾米尔-艾哈迈德（Jameel Ahmad）表示，巴基斯坦计划明年推出采用新设计的所有面值的纸币，以提高安全性能。【原文：Pakistan plans to unveil currency notes of all denominations with a new design next year to improve security features, according to central bank Governor Jameel Ahmad.】

item.title: 澳大利亚证券和投资委员会（ASIC）称，不透明的澳大利亚私募市场带来巨大风险
item.description: 澳大利亚的私募市场在迅速扩张的同时，也给越来越多的投资者带来了潜在的巨大风险，因此成为澳大利亚证券监管机构的政策重点。【原文：Private markets in Australia are hiding potentially large risks to a growing number of investors amid their rapid expansion, making them a key policy focus for the nation’s securities regulator.】

item.title: 阿根廷将加入美国促进金属投资小组
item.description: 美国国务院的一位官员表示，阿根廷正在加入一项由美国牵头的倡议，旨在吸引更多的投资进入关键矿产的开采领域，这也是建立不涉及中国的金属供应链的努力的一部分。【原文：Argentina is joining a US-led initiative aimed at drawing more investment in critical-minerals mining, a State Department official said, part of an effort to create supply chains for the metals that don’t involve China.】

item.title: 托马斯持有皮博迪股份并建议回购后皮博迪股价上涨
item.description: 在 Thomist Capital Management LP 披露持有 9.96% 的股份并敦促这家煤矿公司回购股票后，皮博迪能源公司（Peabody Energy Corp.【原文：Peabody Energy Corp. rose more than 7 percent after Thomist Capital Management LP disclosed a 9.96 percent stake and urged the coal miner to buy back shares.】

item.title: 西方资产公司肯-利奇在美国证券交易委员会的调查中请假
item.description: 西部资产管理公司（Western Asset Management）的肯-利奇（Ken Leech）将立即向公司请假，专注于美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）的调查。【原文：Western Asset Management’s Ken Leech is taking an immediate leave of absence from the firm to focus on a Securities and Exchange Commission probe.】

item.title: 肯尼亚顶级银行肯尼亚中央银行利润增长 87%，将支付中期股息
item.description: 肯尼亚最大的银行肯尼亚商业银行集团（KCB Group Plc）称上半年利润激增 87%，并表示将派发中期股息。【原文：KCB Group Plc said first-half profit surged 87% as Kenya’s biggest bank said it will pay an interim dividend.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行和加拿大帝国商业银行牵头为德国大型氢能项目融资
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）和加拿大帝国商业银行（Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce）等银行承诺支持德国最大的氢能项目之一。【原文：BNP Paribas SA and Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce are among banks that have committed to backing one of Germany’s largest hydrogen projects.】

item.title: 贝莱德削减对气候和社会股东提案的支持
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）连续第三年减少了对有关环境和社会问题的股东提案的支持，认为许多提案缺乏价值，损害了长期的经济利益，同时对改善公司状况作用不大。【原文：BlackRock Inc. reduced its support for shareholder proposals on environmental and social issues for a third straight year, arguing that many of the efforts lacked merit and harmed long-term financial interests while doing little to improve companies.】

item.title: 债券市场专业人士对来自加密货币的小鲸鱼不以为然
item.description: 它们正在成为金融界最奇怪的伙伴：美国财政部发行的证券安全可靠，而加密货币却并不安全。【原文：They are turning into the strangest of bedfellows in the financial world: The famously safe securities issued by the US Treasury and the notoriously not-so-safe world of cryptocurrencies.】

item.title: 贝恩称：资产管理公司必须立即投资私募市场
item.description: 贝恩咨询公司（Bain & Co.【原文：A wide variety of asset managers need to look at investing in private markets if they want to avoid wipe-out, while revamping their entire strategies to ride the wave, according to Bain & Co.】

item.title: 道明银行的美国零售银行曾备受推崇，如今却拖累了股价
item.description: 多伦多多米尼克银行（Toronto-Dominion Bank）进军美国的成本高昂，原本是为了促进增长。相反，它却拖累了盈利能力，严重损害了该银行的声誉。【原文：Toronto-Dominion Bank’s expensive foray into the US was supposed to supercharge its growth. Instead, it’s become a drag on profitability and badly dented the lender’s reputation.】

item.title: 印度部长称大型电子商务挤压中小型商店
item.description: 印度贸易部长皮尤什-戈亚尔（Piyush Goyal）周三表示，亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc.【原文：India’s trade minister Piyush Goyal on Wednesday said the growth of big e-commerce companies such as Amazon.com Inc. risks putting about 100 million small mom-and-pop stores in the country out of business.】

item.title: 乔拉曼丹拉姆将由私人贷款人出售印度最大的 Perp 债券
item.description: Cholamandalam 投资与金融公司将通过永续债券融资 100 亿卢比（1.19 亿美元），这是印度私人金融公司最大的此类债务销售。【原文：Cholamandalam Investment and Finance Co. will raise 10 billion rupees ($119 million) through a perpetual bond, the largest such debt sale by an Indian private financier.】

item.title: 维京航空将公布业绩，旅游疲劳阻碍首次公开募股反弹
item.description: 本周四，维京控股有限公司（Viking Holdings Ltd.）将公布季度业绩报告，这家邮轮公司很可能会发现，其在股市上的火爆表现能否抵挡住旅游业需求的降温。【原文：When Viking Holdings Ltd. reports quarterly results on Thursday, the cruise line operator is likely to discover whether its hot start in the stock market can withstand cooling demand in the travel industry.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长帕内塔称有理由认为利率将下降
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员法比奥-帕内塔（Fabio Panetta）表示，未来进一步降息的预期是现实的。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Fabio Panetta said it’s realistic to expect that there are further interest-rate cuts ahead.】

item.title: 福特斥资 19 亿美元推出 SUV，进一步退出电动汽车市场
item.description: 福特汽车公司正在重新调整其电气化战略，取消了全电动运动型多功能车的计划，这一转变可能会使该汽车制造商损失约19亿美元。【原文：Ford Motor Co. is recalibrating its electrification strategy yet again, canceling plans for a fully electric sport utility vehicle in a shift that may cost the carmaker around $1.9 billion.】

item.title: A16z 以 20 亿美元估值支持 IP 区块链开发商
item.description: 故事协议（Story Protocol）是一个专注于知识产权的区块链，其背后的软件公司在风险投资公司 a16z crypto 领投的一轮融资中筹集了 8000 万美元。【原文：The software company behind Story Protocol, an intellectual property-focused blockchain, raised $80 million in a round led by venture capital firm a16z crypto.】

item.title: 大多数金融科技合作银行报告因合规问题造成损失
item.description: 在数字银行时代，越来越多的金融科技公司与中小型 "赞助银行 "合作提供服务，但这并非没有代价。【原文：In the age of digital banking, an increasing number of financial-technology companies are partnering with small and midsize “sponsor banks,” to provide services — but not without a cost.】

item.title: 中国的巨型煤堆是气候问题的成功典范
item.description:
清洁发电的蓬勃发展正在减少对化石燃料的需求。【原文：

Surging clean-power generation is diminishing the need for the fossil fuel.

】

item.title: 美元疲软抵消美国作物丰收迹象，大豆上涨
item.description: 大豆价格上涨，原因是美元汇率下滑抵消了美国作物产量预测强劲的影响，而美国作物产量预测强劲曾导致大豆期货连续几周下跌。【原文：Soybean prices rose as a slump in dollar outweighed the strong US crop forecasts that had driven futures down for several weeks.】

item.title: 意大利总统帕内塔称欧盟需要移民来发展经济
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员法比奥-帕内塔（Fabio Panetta）说，包括意大利在内的欧洲国家要想克服人口老龄化的挑战并持久改善经济增长，就必须允许经济移民。【原文：European countries including Italy need to allow economic migration if they want to overcome the challenge of aging populations and improve growth durably, European Central Bank Governing Council member Fabio Panetta said.】

item.title: 欧洲疾控中心主任称非洲疫情需要更多检测
item.description: 该地区主要卫生咨询机构的负责人说，一种导致麻腮风的变异病毒株正在助长非洲几个国家的疫情爆发，它很可能导致欧洲出现零星的输入病例。【原文：A mutated strain of the virus that causes mpox, which is fueling an outbreak in several African countries, is likely to lead to sporadic imported cases in Europe, the chief of the region’s main health-advisory body said.】

item.title: 美国购房申请降至二月以来最低点
item.description: 衡量美国购房抵押贷款申请的一项指标上周下滑至 2 月份以来的最低水平，表明高房价阻碍了因抵押贷款利率下降而出现的需求上升苗头。【原文：A measure of US mortgage applications for home purchases slid last week to the lowest level since February, indicating elevated housing prices are impeding a nascent upswing in demand from falling mortgage rates.】

item.title: 台湾中央银行警告贷款人可能会采取行动冷却房地产
item.description: 台湾中央银行宣布加大力度促使银行冷却房地产贷款，并警告说如果劝说无效，将准备采取行动。【原文：Taiwan’s central bank announced broader efforts to get banks to cool their property lending, warning it’s prepared to take action if persuasion doesn’t work.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。在数据修正可能导致美国就业岗位减少一百万个之前，市场走势飘忽不定，而债券市场则对美联储降息押下重注。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. Markets drift before data revisions that could wipe away a million US jobs, while the bond market bets big on Fed rate cuts. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】
